trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Proporciona compatibilidad en tiempo de diseño en un diseñador visual para el control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDataSourceDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Crea una nueva instancia de <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDataSourceDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDataSourceDesigner.Configure" /> method can be called by the design host.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene un valor que indica si el host de diseño puede llamar al método <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDataSourceDesigner.Configure" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDataSourceDesigner.Configure" /> method can be called; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Es <see langword="true" /> si se puede llamar al método <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDataSourceDesigner.Configure" />; en caso contrario, es <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema(System.Boolean)" /> method can be called by the design host.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene un valor que indica si el host de diseño puede llamar al método <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema(System.Boolean)" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema(System.Boolean)" /> method can be called; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Es <see langword="true" /> si se puede llamar al método <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema(System.Boolean)" />; en caso contrario, es <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.CommandText" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece la propiedad <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.CommandText" /> del control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource" />.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.CommandText" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Valor de propiedad <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.CommandText" />.

trans-unit.source: Launches the data source configuration utility in the design host.
trans-unit.target: Inicia la utilidad de configuración de orígenes de datos en el host de diseño.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.ConnectionString" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece la propiedad <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.ConnectionString" /> del control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource" />.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.ConnectionString" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Valor de propiedad <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.ConnectionString" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.DefaultContainerName" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece la propiedad <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.DefaultContainerName" /> del control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource" />.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.DefaultContainerName" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Valor de propiedad <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.DefaultContainerName" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EntitySetName" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece la propiedad <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EntitySetName" /> del control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource" />.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EntitySetName" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Valor de propiedad <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EntitySetName" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EntityTypeFilter" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece la propiedad <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EntityTypeFilter" /> del control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource" />.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EntityTypeFilter" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Valor de propiedad <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EntityTypeFilter" />.

trans-unit.source: The name of the view to return.
trans-unit.target: Nombre de la vista que se va a devolver.

trans-unit.source: Returns a data source view that has the specified name.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve una vista de origen de datos que tiene el nombre especificado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Design.EntityDesignerDataSourceView" /> object with the name specified by <paramref name="viewName" />.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Design.EntityDesignerDataSourceView" /> con el nombre especificado por <paramref name="viewName" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of available views.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene una lista de las vistas disponibles.

trans-unit.source: A collection with one element that contains the name "DefaultView".
trans-unit.target: Colección con un elemento que contiene el nombre "DefaultView".

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" /> object to initialize.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" /> que se va a inicializar.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the control designer and loads the specified component.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa el diseñador de controles y carga el componente especificado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.OrderBy" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece la propiedad <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.OrderBy" /> del control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource" />.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.OrderBy" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Valor de propiedad <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.OrderBy" />.

trans-unit.source: The properties to be filtered.
trans-unit.target: Las propiedades que se van a filtrar.

trans-unit.source: Used by the designer to add properties or remove properties in the properties grid, or to shadow properties of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Lo usa el diseñador para agregar propiedades o quitar propiedades en la cuadrícula de propiedades, o para crear copias sombra de las propiedades del control asociado.

trans-unit.source: This member overrides <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Este miembro invalida <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to suppress all data source events until the schema is refreshed.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para suprimir todos los eventos de origen de datos hasta que se actualice el esquema.

trans-unit.source: Refreshes the schema from the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: Actualiza el esquema del origen de datos subyacente.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.Select" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece la propiedad <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.Select" /> del control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource" />.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.Select" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Valor de propiedad <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.Select" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.Where" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece la propiedad <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.Where" /> del control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource" />.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.Where" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Valor de propiedad <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.Where" />.
